name: Sea Foam Salad
author: CORGI23
summary: A light Jell-O salad, great for summer barbecues or with Christmas dinner!
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-O® mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
directions: In a small saucepan, heat 1 cup reserved pear juice to boiling
Pour over lime gelatin in a small bowl; stir until dissolved
In a large bowl, beat cream cheese with milk until smooth
Chill in the refrigerator until partially thickened, about 20 to 30 minutes
In a small bowl, mash pears until smooth
Fold pears and whipped topping into gelatin mixture
Chill until set, about 2 to 3 hours
Dip mold in warm water for approximately 5 seconds
